DataElement.preferredName: Natural Killer Cell Laboratory Procedure Cell Total Integer::2 Decimal Place Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Natural killer cells are cells that resemble large granular lymphocytes.  They do not express markers of either T or B cell lineage. They are positive for CD16, CD56, and CD 94.  These cells do possess Fc receptors for IgG and can kill target cells using antibody-dependent cell-mediated cytotoxicity. They can also use perforin to kill cells in the absence of antibody and killing may occur without previous sensitization._Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._The smallest units of living structure capable of independent existence, composed of a membrane-enclosed mass of protoplasm and containing a nucleus or nucleoid._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::2_An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers._To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Natural killer cells are cells that resemble large granular lymphocytes.  They do not express markers of either T or B cell lineage. They are positive for CD16, CD56, and CD 94.  These cells do possess Fc receptors for IgG and can kill target cells using antibody-dependent cell-mediated cytotoxicity. They can also use perforin to kill cells in the absence of antibody and killing may occur without previous sensitization._Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: White blood cells that attack tumor cells and body cells that have been invaded by foreign substances.

Concepts.definition: Natural killer cells are cells that resemble large granular lymphocytes.  They do not express markers of either T or B cell lineage. They are positive for CD16, CD56, and CD 94.  These cells do possess Fc receptors for IgG and can kill target cells using antibody-dependent cell-mediated cytotoxicity. They can also use perforin to kill cells in the absence of antibody and killing may occur without previous sensitization.

Property.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Cell Total Integer::2 Decimal Place Count
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The smallest units of living structure capable of independent existence, composed of a membrane-enclosed mass of protoplasm and containing a nucleus or nucleoid. Cells are highly variable and specialized in both structure and function, though all must at some stage replicate proteins and nucleic acids, utilize energy, and reproduce themselves.:Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.:A number with no fractional part.::2:An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: The smallest units of living structure capable of independent existence, composed of a membrane-enclosed mass of protoplasm and containing a nucleus or nucleoid.
Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers.
Determining the number or amount of something.
